fields.label: Event Days
fields.name: event_days
fields.instructions: Format: mm/dd/yyyy. Separate multiple dates with a comma then a space. Example: 02/03/1989, 02/23/1992, 09/29/2017.

fields.label: Event Date Info
fields.name: event_date_info
fields.instructions: Special way to list event's time. ie- "Every Thursday at 8PM between 12/4 and 12/18."

sub_fields.label: Link URL
sub_fields.name: link_url
sub_fields.instructions: Enter link to PDF, YouTube Video, or any site. Defaults to the image URL.
